description: This course provides a comprehensive research opportunity, including an introduction to relevant
background material, technical instruction, identification of a meaningful project, data
collection and analysis, and writing. The topic is determined by the faculty member in charge of
the course and may relate to their research interests. This course meets the Writing in the
Major requirements for Biology majors. Offered based on department decision. May be offered as a
1.00 credit course or .50 credit course. Prerequisite: determined by instructor.
